definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Currently there are no laws or regulations applicable on gay issues.
sentences.chinese: 目前還沒有關於同性戀議題的相關法律條文。

sentences.english: The trial had forced Hadden to investigate the relevant legal codes.
sentences.chinese: 這次審判迫使哈頓仔細地研究相關的法律條文和條款。

sentences.english: Lawyers should cite legal articles to support their own ideas.
sentences.chinese: 律師要援引律條支持自己的觀點。

sentences.english: All four disciplines are described in Table 1.
sentences.chinese: 圖1中描述了所有這四個律條。

sentences.english: The result is that individual countries increasingly toughen their laws on adoption.
sentences.chinese: 結果就是各國有關領養的法律條文越來越嚴格。

sentences.english: All laws must be written in accordance with the constitution.
sentences.chinese: 一切法律條文都必須符合憲法。

sentences.english: Mr Paul’s bill is unlikely to become law.
sentences.chinese: 保羅的議案最終不可能成爲法律條文。
